org.agorava.api.storage

Interface Repository<T extends Identifiable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of element contained in repo
    All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<T>, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GlobalRepository, UserSessionRepository

    public interface Repository<T extends Identifiable>
extends Serializable, Iterable<T>
    A repository containing a collection of element that can be iterated
    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand
